title.en: Pouring Money Into the Underdog Mercenaries

altTitles.en: Saving a Mercenary Unit from Bankruptcy

altTitles.ja: 赤字傭兵団の経営コンサルタント

altTitles.zh: 给穷光蛋雇佣兵团搞钱

description.en:
Lee Ji-hyun, was lost in a snowstorm and rescued. But it was not Korea, no matter how you looked at it! The most elite military group, the Nio Mercenaries, led by the strongest warrior Valdemar, saved Ji-hyun?! Ji-hyun decides to sell them her abilities to survive. "Don't you need one management mentor?" Indeed, Ji-hyun can find a way to save the Nio mercenaries and return home safely?

---
Jihyeon, a business consultant from Korea, ends up stranded in another world. She is rescued by the members of the Nio Mercenary Corps, only to find out that the unit is on the verge of bankruptcy. A passionate professional, Jihyeon cannot ignore their dismal financial state. To help the corps, and in hopes of returning home, she volunteers to serve as the corps’s financial officer. Turning around a struggling mercenary corps is no easy feat, but Jihyeon and the corps members stick together through thick and thin. Her chance of going back home, however, remains elusive.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6744155), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784823)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/saving-a-mercenary-unit-from-bankruptcy/list?title_no=4686)

description.ko:
눈보라 속에서 길을 잃었다 구조된 이지현.
하지만 그곳은 아무리 봐도 한국이 아니었다!
지현을 구해준 건 최강의 전사 발데마르가 이끄는 최정예 군사집단 니오 용병대?!
지현은 생존을 위해 그들에게 능력을 팔기로 한다.
​
"혹시 경영지도사 한 명 필요하지 않으세요?"
​
과연 지현은 니오 용병대를 살리고,
자신 또한 무사히 집에 돌아갈 방법을 찾을 수 있을까?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6744155), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784823)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/saving-a-mercenary-unit-from-bankruptcy/list?title_no=4686)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15212)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001748)
description.ru:
Ли Джихён заблудилась, и её спасли от снежной бури наёмники Нио – самая элитная военная группа, возглавляемая сильнейшим воином Вальдемаром. Но оказалось, что Джихён больше не в Корее! Чтобы выжить в новом мире, Джихён решает продать им свои способности. "Всем нужен умелый менеджер!" Сможет ли Джихён выручить наемников Нио и найти способ вернуться домой?

---
